snippet: Security officials in the northwestern Chinese province of Gansu said five Tibetans convinced others that they would become heroes in death, according to state media.
abstract: Security officials in northwestern Chinese province of Gansu arrest five Tibetans and accuse them of inciting series of self-immolations late in 2012 by convincing participants that they would become heroes in death.
lead_paragraph: Security officials in the northwestern Chinese province of Gansu said five Tibetans convinced others that they would become heroes in death, according to state media.
